verbs.description: [ARG0: Gov. Scott Walker] [V: refused] [ARG1: to take a position] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [C-ARG1: on the Trump administration 's policy of separating families after illegal border crossings] and ignored calls to pull Wisconsin National Guard troops off the southern border .
